typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS',
		UpdatedDate as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSSSSS'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
